fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a Target, If successful, You will learn their Abilities and may choose one to copy permanently.
- Short-circuit a Target, If successful, You will learn their attributes and may choose one to copy permanently.
- Fire your gun at someone, dealing an Astral Basic attack.
- Deliver a package to a player each night, healing and protecting them with Powerful defence for the night. [0 uses.]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You retain abilities/attributes through games, please ping @bionic64 to add new abilities/attributes.
- You're given one package at the start of each night.
